title: Wilson's Tales of the Borders and of Scotland, Volume 07
author: Various
snippet: For years and years was Judith known,    Queen of a wild world all her own;    By Wooler Haugh, by silver Till,    By Coldstream Bridge, and Flodden Hill:

title: Men and manners in Britain;
author: Thorburn, Grant
snippet: The battle of Flodden Hill was perhaps the most disastrous that ever Scotland saw.
